snippet: SUNY officials said on Monday that a developer had offered to buy the hospital in Brooklyn and lease much of the block back to one or more health care providers.
lead_paragraph: SUNY officials said on Monday that a developer had offered to buy the hospital in Brooklyn and lease much of the block back to one or more health care providers.
abstract: Long Island College Hospital, which became a symbol of New York City’s struggling community hospitals during the mayoral race, is considering an offer to redevelop its Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, property; SUNY officials say that a developer has offered to buy the property and lease much of it back to one or more health care providers.

headline.main: Redevelopment Plan Is Considered for Long Island College Hospital
headline.print_headline: Redevelopment Plan Weighed for Long Island College Hospital
